title: Quinoline–sulfonamides as a multi-targeting neurotherapeutic for cognitive decline: in vitro, in silico studies and ADME evaluation of monoamine oxidases and cholinesterases inhibitors

Alzheimer's disease (AD) is a multifactorial irreversible neurological disorder with multiple enzymes involved.
